product_name: Hammer Nutrition Race Caps Supreme - 90 Capsules
long_description: Safely boost your energy and endurance by taking Race Caps(R) Supreme Capsules. Designed to reduce muscle fatigue, increase workload capacity, enhance recovery, energy and endurance. Each caplet contains a blend of vitamins and nutrients to help take your training to the next level. Suggested use: take two to three capsules one hour before workout. Take one caplet in the morning on nonworkout days. Ingredients (one capsule): vitamin E (133 I.U.), calcium (25mg), magnesium (17 mg), potassium (10 mg), mito-matrix (72 mg) and oxy-assist (258 mg). Includes Enzyme Enhancement System(TM) ( 8 mg); a blend of protease, amylase, glucoamylase, lipase, cellulase, phytase, maltase and sucrase. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Safely boost your energy and endurance by taking Race Caps(R) Supreme Capsules.
